modName: Fix for KillerKeo Skimpy Female Clothes Textures
summary: A fix that makes some female clothes from Killer Keo Skimpy mod appear as intended, using proper textures.
descriptionHtml:
This is a small fix that makes some of the female clothes variants from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3654/ ]Killer Keo's CBBE armor replacer mod[/url] use their intended textures instead of the default clothes they are based off of.

[color=#ff0000]Version 0.3 requires Dawnguard and Dragonborn DLCs[/color]
Meant to be used with KK's armors (see above), based off the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition[/url] body, for people experiencing this issue.

Also, as a side note, if you want custom body size, use the KillerKeo file from the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32731]BodySlide Outfits and Mods mod[/url]. Requires [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32731]CBBE BodySlide 2[/url] (also included with the CBBE body).

[b][color=#ff0000][size=3]This doesn't include any textures or meshes, it just fixes how the game deals with the meshes you have, and redirects the outfits to the proper textures.[/size][/color][/b]

[color=#00ff00]changes:[/color]
v 0.1 - only fixed female guard outfits to be colorfull and not all stormcloak blue
v 0.2 - added fixes for some other chlothes including: barkeep variant, blacksmith variant, fine clothes 2 variant, collage apprentice variant 1, collage apprentice variant 2, collage journeyman variant, Farmer 2 variant, Farmer 3 variant, Farmer 4 variant, merchant variant, miner variant, monk brown, monk green, monk grey, monk red, mourner, and dark brotherhood redguard.
v. 0.3 - added some clothes from Dawnguard and Dragonborn DLCs including: vampire robes variant 1 (the Queen Valerica one) from Dawnguard, and dark elf red and blue variants and morag tong cuirass from Dragonborn
author: LegoHog
